Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I felt safer talking with a computer than a real person as I was less judged

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: There is a human aspect of empathy that is hit or miss with the teacher depending on the teacher. Pretty sure i would get better empathy from AI if prompt asks it to respond empathetically
